Name: VirtualMachineConfiguration
SummaryComment: The configuration for compute nodes in a pool based on the Azure Virtual Machines infrastructure.

Key.Name: ImageReference
Key.SummaryComment: A reference to the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace Image or the custom Virtual Machine Image to use.

Key.Name: NodeAgentSkuId
Key.SummaryComment: The SKU of Batch Node Agent to be provisioned on the compute node.
Key.RemarksComment: The Batch node agent is a program that runs on each node in the pool, and provides the command-and-control interface between the node and the Batch service. There are different implementations of the node agent, known as SKUs, for different operating systems.

Key.Name: DataDisks
Key.SummaryComment: The configuration for data disks attached to the Compute Nodes in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This property must be specified if the Compute Nodes in the pool need to have empty data disks attached to them. This cannot be updated.

Key.Name: LicenseType
Key.SummaryComment: The type of on-premises license to be used when deploying the operating system.
Key.RemarksComment: This only applies to images that contain the Windows operating system, and should only be used when you hold valid on-premises licenses for the nodes which will be deployed. If omitted, no on-premises licensing discount is applied. Values are: 'Windows_Server' - The on-premises license is for Windows Server. 'Windows_Client' - The on-premises license is for Windows Client.

Key.Name: WindowsConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: Windows operating system settings on the Virtual Machine. This property must not be specified if the ImageReference property specifies a Linux OS image.

Key.Name: ContainerConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The container configuration for the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: If specified, setup is performed on each node in the pool to allow tasks to run in containers. All regular tasks and job manager tasks run on this pool must specify <see cref="TaskContainerSettings" />, and all other tasks may specify it.

Key.Name: DiskEncryptionConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The disk encryption configuration for the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: If specified, encryption is performed on each node in the pool during node provisioning.

Key.Name: NodePlacementConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The node placement configuration for the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This configuration will specify rules on how nodes in the pool will be physically allocated.

Key.Name: Extensions
Key.SummaryComment: The virtual machine extension for the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: If specified, the extensions mentioned in this configuration will be installed on each node.

Key.Name: OSDisk
Key.SummaryComment: Settings for the operating system disk of the Virtual Machine.

Key.Name: ServiceArtifactReference
Key.SummaryComment: Specifies the service artifact reference id used to set same image version for all virtual machines in the scale set when using 'latest' image version.
Key.RemarksComment: The service artifact reference id in the form of /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.Compute/galleries/{galleryName}/serviceArtifacts/{serviceArtifactName}/vmArtifactsProfiles/{vmArtifactsProfilesName}

Key.Name: SecurityProfile
Key.SummaryComment: Specifies the security profile settings for the virtual machine or virtual machine scale set.
